# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-

import sys

N, K = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))
h = list(map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split()))

count = 0
for i in range(N):
    if h[i] >= K:
        count += 1

print(count)

n, k = map(int, input().split())
h = [int(input()) for _ in range(n)]
print(sum(1 for i in h if i >= k))
n, k = map(int, input().split())
h = [int(input()) for _ in range(n)]
print(sum(1 if i >= k else 0 for i in h))

import sys

N, K = list(map(int,sys.stdin.readline().split()))
h = list(map(int,sys.stdin.readline().split()))

count = 0 
for i in range(N):
    if h[i] >= K:
        count += 1

print(count)

n = int(input())
a = list(map(int, input().split()))

ans = 0
for i in range(n):
    ans += 1/a[i]

print(1/ans)
